en-US.summary: Randomly selects a Latin proverb from wikiquote, reads it in Latin with IPA dictated pronunciation, and reads the English translation.
examplePhrases: Alexa give me a latin proverb
Alexa tell me a latin proverb
en-US.name: Latin-Proverbs
en-US.description: Randomly selects a Latin proverb from wikiquote, reads it in Latin with IPA dictated pronunciation, and reads the English translation.
